metadata.title: CVE-2016-10045 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The isMail transport in PHPMailer before 5.2.20 might allow remoteattackers to pass extra parameters to the mail command and consequentlyexecute arbitrary code by leveraging improper interaction between theescapeshellarg function and internal escaping performed in the mailfunction in PHP. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incorrectfix for CVE-2016-10033.

criterions.comment: libphp-phpmailer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
